company_description: Monzo is a digital bank based in the UK that offers online banking services, including current accounts, savings accounts, and money management tools through its mobile app.
founders: Gary Dolman, Jason Bates, Jonas Huckestein, Paul Rippon, Tom Blomfield
seed_investors: Passion Capital, Jeremy Yap, BlueWire Capital
universities: Exeter, Liverpool, Uni of Wolves, Uni of Oxford
embedding_text: Monzo is a digital bank based in the UK that offers online banking services, including current accounts, savings accounts, and money management tools through its mobile app.
